mainText:
Promo: "Bank of Entitlement-where you deserve everything and more! Get ready to be treated like royalty with our exclusive services!"

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, picture this: I stroll into my Bank of Entitlement branch, expecting my usual red-carpet treatment. But what's this? A line? Me, waiting in line like some commoner? Unacceptable. I demand to speak to the manager-only to find out they're on vacation. Well, that won't do. I promptly declare that I'm the CEO, causing chaos as employees scramble to accommodate my every whim. Minutes later, I'm led to a VIP lounge, where a personal banker named Tiffany fawns over me like I'm some sort of financial deity. Ah, now this is more like it. As I bask in the glow of my entitlement, I can't help but feel a twinge of satisfaction. After all, it's not easy being me. But hey, someone's gotta do it, right?
